name: HorribleMoviePlots
0:
”Alexa, start Horrible Movie Plots.”
”Alexa, open Horrible Movie Plots.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: horrible movie plots
des:
Big movie buff?

Can you guess what movie it is?

We will make it really hard for you with theses vague, improper and frankly, horrible movie plot descriptions.
Try your luck and see how many you can guess correctly. 

 ___________________________________________________________________________
 | You can say: | 
 | |
 | "Alexa, start Horrible Movie Plots" |
 | "Alexa, launch Horrible Movie Plots" |
 | |
 | and more, simply open the skill by saying: “Alexa, open Horrible Movie Plots”! |
 |___________________________________________________________________________|


To show us that it is worth putting more time and effort into developing this skill and similar ones, you can encourage us by leaving a rating.
For every 5 Star Rating, we will add another 5 movie plots for you to guess.

Currently available movie plots to guess: 10.



If you want to make suggestions for more movie plots or have some feedback, contact us: madalexaskills@gmx.net
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
